critique: This document establishes an Integrity Committee to investigate allegations of wrongdoing by Inspectors General and certain staff members within the Offices of Inspectors General. It aims to ensure that such allegations are appropriately and expeditiously investigated and resolved. The order outlines the composition of the Integrity Committee, the referral process for allegations, the authority to investigate, and the procedures for reporting and resolving findings. It emphasizes internal management and does not create enforceable rights.
